ENGLISH: Currently, a large part of Manchuria is under Soviet control and is being used by the Chinese communist revolutionaries as a base of operations. Considering the current situation of the Chinese Civil War, it might be time to put Manchuria under direct Chinese control.

Currently, a large part of Manchuria is under Soviet control and used by the Chinese communist revolutionaries as a base of operation. However, the Communists are not doing well and might even lose the war. Perhaps it is time to adjust our strategy in China.

After the Soviet Invasion of the Asian mainland territories under Japanese control, Manchuria fell under the control of the USSR. With the Communists starting to lose ground, the Soviets have decided to give us full control over Manchuria. This brings us one step closer to a fully unified China.

After the Soviet Invasion of the Asian mainland territories under Japanese control, Manchuria fell under the control of the USSR. Now, the Soviets have decided to give us full control over Manchuria. China is one step closer to being fully unified.

Instead of supporting the revolution and handing over Manchuria to us, the Soviets have given it to the Nationalists and ousted our troops. With Manchuria lost as a base of operation, our chances of defeating the Nationalists grow thinner.
